name: init(contentsOf:including:options:baseURL:)
desc: Creates an attributed string from the contents of a specified URL that contains Markdown-formatted data, using the provided options and attribute scope.
declaration: init<S>(contentsOf url: URL, including scope: S.Type, options: AttributedString.MarkdownParsingOptions = .init(), baseURL: URL? = nil) throws where S : AttributeScope
